channel.title: Operation Flashpoint 2
channel.description:
Is it worth it?
I loved OPFlash1 but I know it has nothing to do, I know the real succesor to that is ARMA so the question stands, is OPFlash2 any good?

item.title: Operation Flashpoint 2
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
Just bought ARMA2 on steam, seemed a bit expensive for its age though (15€) but played the demo of it just to make sure I´d still enjoy it and did so all is good : )

Read full topic

item.title: Operation Flashpoint 2
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
OPF2 is quite fun mixture between arcade and sim shooting.

Except that I’d go with ARMA 2.
